Name: Drunk: Relapsed
About the game: You need to get home safely after a wild night out. On the way, you will encounter many obstacles that will make your journey difficult. The game includes two game modes: Arcade & Endurance. The maneuverability of the game is based on momentum, so be careful with your inputs. The game also features jumping, which requires perfect timing and coordination. The slightest mistake will make you tumble down so be careful with your movements!
